summary: Rising from the ashes of Nirvana, the Foo Fighters became a Grammy-winning sensation on their own. Sixteen years of the band's history comes to life in this documentary, from their demo ... See full summary Â»
cast: Shawn Cloninger|William Goldsmith|Jessy Greene|Dave Grohl|Taylor Hawkins|Rami Jaffee|Nate Mendel|Bob Mould|Krist Novoselic|Chris Shiflett|Pat Smear|Franz Stahl|Butch Vig
title: Foo Fighters: Back and Forth
